html: Sprinkle with baptism, (Haydock) and his manifold graces. (Calmet)— Septuagint, "so many nations shall wonder at him." (Haydock)—Mouth, out of reverence. How many great princes have submitted to his yoke? (Calmet)—Beheld. The Gentiles (Menochius) embrace the faith, at the sight of Christ's miracles. (Calmet)
